posts.post_title: FS: Lou Fiene Port. PSA 4 Polar Bear SOLD!
posts.post_content:
soldSelling this nice Lou Fiene Portrait PSA 4 w/Polar Bear back. Asking  $65 delivered. The mark on the front boarder appears to be a print flaw to me, under magnification it doesn't look man made. Paypal F/F preferred but open to other payments. Questions and payment to [url]rknight1@columbus.rr.com[/url].
